domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical
domain.description: Top level interests and hobbies groupings, like Food or Travel

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: French journalists show life in China amid the coronavirus outbreak
entity.description: Correspondents based in China for French news publications Le Figaro, Les Echos and France 2 have been reporting from the frontlines of the coronavirus crisis in Wuhan as well as from the capital city Beijing. Their photos and videos highlight the Chinese government's response to the outbreak, the nouveau "ghost towns" and the measures people are taking to avoid catching the illness.

entity.name: First coronavirus case confirmed in Africa, Egyptian officials say
entity.description: On Friday, Egyptian health authorities said Africa’s first coronavirus case had been confirmed. The country's health minister said the affected person is a “foreigner” who is currently in isolation.
